system.description:
Effect: The user places 10 floating rock mines within 10m of the [Blast X] area's center. When a creature moves within 3m of a rock mine, it homes in on them and deals a Tick of Rock-Type damage.

The user may spend up to 6 additional PP, increasing the Power of this attack by 15 per PP spent.

Requirement: User is a Dynamaxed Drednaw and has a Water-Type attack on their Active List.
